definition[0]: (1950â€“) the second child and only daughter of the British queen, Elizabeth II. Her official title is The Princess Royal. In 1973 she married Captain Mark Phillips, but they divorced in 1992. Later in the same year she married Timothy Laurence. She is known for her skill at riding horses and was a member of the British Olympic team in 1976. She works actively to support many charity organizations, especially as president of the Save the Children Fund.
